description: Layla Moran's relatives and the Latin Patriarchate of Jerusalem say a sniper has killed two women there.
maintext: Early on in the war Israel told people in northern Gaza to move to southern Gaza for their safety. It has also paused military activity in some areas for short periods to allow people to leave. There was also a temporary ceasefire between Israel and Hamas to allow a swap of some Israeli hostages and Palestinian prisoners.
title: UK MP Layla Moran's family among hundreds trapped in Gaza church
